showHeader.description: Show or hide the header with steps.

showHeaderBorder.description: Show or hide the header bottom border.

showNavigation.description: Hide or show Next and Previous Buttons at the bottom.

prevBtnOnLastStep.description: Show or hide the previous button in the last step (maybe the last step is a thank you message and you don't want them to go back).

dontValidate.description: Dev control to disable validation rules called in step components.

preventEnterSubmission.description: By default if you hit the Enter key on any element it validates the form and moves to next step if validation passes. Use this to prevent this behaviour.

startAtStep.description: Specify what step to start from in the case you need to skip steps (send in a 0 based index for the item in the steps array. e.g. 2 will load <Step3 /> initially).

nextTextOnFinalActionStep.description: Specify what the next button text should be in the step before the last.

contentAlign.description: Specify the align of wizard components. Can be `left`, `right` and `center`

hocValidationAppliedTo.description: Its recommended that you use basic javascript validation.

onStepChange.description: Called when `Back` or `Next` button is clicked.
